channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Form builder to get in touch with visitors, grow your email list and collect payments — Happyforms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Form builder to get in touch with visitors, grow your email list and collect payments — Happyforms

item.title: CVE-2023-0096|2024-08-02T05:02:43.245Z -- unknown -- form%20builder%20to%20get%20in%20touch%20with%20visitors%2C%20grow%20your%20email%20list%20and%20collect%20payments%20%E2%80%94%20happyforms
item.description: The Happyforms WordPress plugin before 1.22.0 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
